description.english: You have chosen to save Emily and keep Memority.
description.russian: Вы выбрали спасти Эмили и оставить Меморити.

description.english: You have chosen to sacrifice Emily and destroy Memority.
description.russian: Вы выбрали уничтожить Меморити и пожертвовать Эмили.

displayName.english: I should not have suspected him...

description.english: You have found the corpse of Romanov.
You found the entrance to the second block.
description.russian: Вы нашли вход во второй блок.

description.english: And why do they have so many refrigerators...
description.russian: И зачем им так много холодильников…

description.english: Were not you who have staged this murder, were you?
description.russian: А вы точно не сами инсценировали это убийство?

description.english: You stood on the balcony for a few minutes.
description.russian: Вы простояли на балкончике несколько минут.

description.english: You asked every possible question Romanov.
description.russian: Вы задали Романову все возможные вопросы.

description.english: A game? What game? You spent 5 minutes in a web browser.
You have solved all the clues.
You have solved all the clues.
You have solved all the clues.
You listened to the radio for a few minutes.
You have read the newspaper about the accident.
You managed to get to the Memority in 2 minutes.
description.russian: Вы успели добраться до Меморити за 2 минуты.

description.english: You used the elevator to reach the Memority.
description.russian: Вы поднялись на лифте до лечебницы.

description.english: You have solved all the clues.

displayName.english: You want to play like that?

description.english: You want to play like that?

displayName.english: What are the people ready to do for the achievements.
displayName.russian: «И на что люди идут ради ачивок…

description.english: What are the people ready to do for the achievements.
description.russian: И на что люди идут ради ачивок…

displayName.english: All achievements will soon run out.

description.english: All achievements will soon run out.

displayName.english: I am a painter, this is how I see.

description.english: You gave a wrong explanation everywhere.
You did not ask too many questions to Romanov.
description.russian: Вы не стали задавать Романову лишних вопросов.

description.english: You did a mistake 10 times entering a password.
You have passed the second chapter on one of the difficulties.
description.russian: Вы прошли вторую главу на одной из сложностей.

description.english: You have passed the second chapter on the highest difficulty.
description.russian: Вы прошли вторую главу на максимальной сложности.
